content.detailedDescription: We were on a short hoilday break to brighton,were we stoped for a 2hour break in lewes,which is a small old village were i took my camera and started taking photos off the place.In the centre of the village is a old tower clock which i took 3 photos in 3/4 seconds,after our stay we then continued to our destination brighton,for the next 3 days,it was only after i down loaded my photos on my laptop when we got back home,i notice that the 3 photos i took off the tower clock that i notice my sightings,in the first photo you can make out5 shapes each one was about the same distance fron eachother like a triangle about the siges of a pin head,the second ,one object was left off the tower clock,which you can see and count5 engines on the under carraige,the next photo it was on the right side off the clock,like ive wrote i didint take anynotice off the clock it just looked good just to say ive took a photo off it,i have had the photos developed but no one would like tp commint on them.So am writing this letter to yous to help me to understad,that theiris life out their,not just the human spieces,my photos are avaiable on my e/mail address.
content.summary: It was when i transferd my photos onto my laptop that i notice the object,as we were on a hoilday break.

content.detailedDescription: Moon was supposed to be big due to proximity to earth. i took camera out and took some pictures. i saw the object and tried, hurrying, to get decent telephoto shots. batteries went dead. i hurried into house to change batteries and upon return the moon was behind western ridge. i looked for object but didn't see it. my thoughts are that it may have been orbiting our moon. in photos object is bottom right of moon.
content.summary: Taking pictures of moon when i saw object in telephoto.

content.detailedDescription:
Date: january 6, 2014
time: 10:18-10:20pm pst
duration: approx. 2-3 minutes
location: 37���58���35���n, 122���29���34���w
direction of sighting: start = 315��� nw; end 280���w
angle of elevation: estimated at 30��� above horizon, constant
sky condition: near total cloud cover ��� cloud base not known ��� guestimate 10-20,000 feet


description:

my wife and i were in our hot tub, and had been in it for approximately 15 minutes when i noticed three bright objects about the size and brightness of planets (or the iss) in the night sky ��� blue-white in color, twinkling. we have lived at this address for seven years, and have had our hot tub almost as long, and have spent many hours looking up at the night sky here ��� we know what we���re looking at in the sky here.

at first i thought it was an airplane, as i only glimpsed them through branches of a tree on our property. we live on a flight path to sfo, so we get periodic commercial aviation traffic overhead ��� near enough to distinguish each wing, and the lights on them. this was entirely different. two of the lights were moving rapidly in together, with a third one behind them. distance between them was approximately 3-4full moons.

they were heading south, toward the edge of the trees on our property, by leaning over the south edge of our hot tub we could see them emerge from behind the trees. as they did, they joined up with another constellation of 7-10 similar objects that appeared to be stationary, at 280deg w. these objects were oriented in a backwards capital letter ���l��� pattern, with approximately 3 objects oriented horizontally, sloping upward to the south, and a vertical line of 3-4 more going up. they occupied a about 3 full moon���s worth of sky vertically, and maybe 2 horizontally. they appeared to me to be quite uniform in size and color, and were twinkling (or perhaps flashing rapidly). 

at first i thought i was looking at an unusually bright (and severely compacted) version of the constellation orion ��� that was the only thing i could think of that looks even remotely like this. 

as my wife and i watched and tried to figure out what we were seeing, the group of objects slowly began to change shape and appeared to move toward the south, where they eventually dimmed ��� probably fading into the clouds. they still persisted dimly for some time ��� maybe another minute or two. we debated whether to go inside and grab a cell phone to take a picture, but this would not have been feasible in the low light conditions.
content.summary: 7-9 starlike lights moving across night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south bound on fallbrook ave in woodland hills when to lights appeared in the sky. at first i thought it was an airplane coming towartds me . i questioned that because it was not a standard flight path used . that would be for burbank or van nuys airport. the lights were yellowish. the lights separates then flew around each other then hovered together again. light on left discharge a bright white spark that descended to ground. objects began to ascend. then they went dark. a few seconds later another bright spark like discharge. then one appeared duller by itself for a second then they both vanished. the sky was clear. no clouds. no noise.
content.summary: Woodland hills 920pm

content.detailedDescription: Hi everyone i live in fullerton ca and i just saw the strangest brightest blue green light 5 minutes ago. i assume it was over the far end of fullerton near imperial hwy possibly on the boarder of yorba linda. i was lying in my bed watching a shinobi longplay on my computer when out of the corner of my eye i saw the brightest strangest blue green lighted object speeding east to west. it had a blinking red light which i know planes and helicopters have but the way this thing flew was like nothing ive ever seen before! kind of like a wave like pattern but extremely fast for the distance it covered! and blue green light! too quiet to be a helicopter for sure! (i have seen and heard a helicopter at that distance before and this thing was not a helicopter) and and! there was another regular plane flying in from north east with a white light making a very high speed dive at the blue green lighted object. it seemed to me that the blue green lighted object saw the white lighted plane and stopped its forward motion, dead stopped, and sort of hovered for a few seconds and then descended rapidly toward the ground(at that point i could no longer see the red blinking light). during the green blue objects descent the white lighted plane was pulling out of its dive and by the time the white lighted plane was fully horizontal the green blue object had fully disappeared from my view. i could still see the white lighted plane though and it just continued on its way west but it had slowed down substantially. (i should note here that the only reason i assume the white lighted object was just a normal plane was because it didn't match the green blue objects sudden change in direction and the fact that it had to noticeably pull out of its dive pattern.) spectacular event! i hope i find out what this was. this happened at appx. 10:00pm, monday january 6, 2014! what a spectacular site. any information would be greatly appreciated.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright blue green lighted object spotted over yorba linda area jan 6, 2014

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:30 pm eastern standard time on january 6, 2013, i was at my uncles house when i noticed 2 red lights off in the distance. as it gets closer to us i realize that the 2 lights belonged to 1 craft based on how close the lights were to each other. the craft was heading towards a bright white object to the northeast of where i was. the craft that i was able to observe had 2 red synchronized lights, appeared to be under intelligent control, and was the size of at least 2 or 3 commercial airline planes in length. i couldnt determine the width of the object. the craft made no sound and it was a cigar or oblong shape. the sighting only lasted a few minutes. after the sighting, i saw what i assumed was a military aircraft flying in the same direction as the craft i saw.
content.summary: The object was cigar or oblong shaped and it was at least 100+ feet long

content.detailedDescription: Out on back balcony at 2120 lit a smoke and light seen towards estrella mountain area, sw.  pulsating for a few minutes then dimmed out.  see type of object in the pass, approx. same area, normally 1 seen at a time, but have seen multiple lights in location.
content.summary: Glowing orange light, seemed to pulse dark to orange

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming in from hunting and wife showed up after work unloading our things and i looked up to see the lights and i saw it was in the spot i had seen a few days previous but this was orb sphere shaped not the bar shape i had witnessed a few days earlier toward the north east it looked up and notices the sequence of lights and they didn't match the light pattern of commercial airlines the lights were blinking in sequence and surging in power i was watching they high powered binocs and i noticed a jet pattern of light and sound coming in from the nnw and the craft winked out just like a light bulb and disappeared i new also it was not a star because the lights were reflecting of of the bottom side of the stratus clouds and the disappearance of the craft was sudden and the light was not visable from the top side so it had to exit upward at extreme rate then two more planes came in from the west and nwest i and a retired fire chief marine i am and outdoorsman i'm
outside at night all the time i've also seen a bar lighted object the same lights but moving at a very slow rate of speed and moving north east with no noise and also being followed be chase planes two days earlier i've also seen plane flying at night with no sound like a new propulsion system  i see planes at night also running attack patterns in  the night sky dropping  a large amount of missile deterrent flares and other military practices and events and patrols that i can discuss in person at some other later date i see a lot out here and i'm a credible witness
content.summary: Outside thought what might be a star but i knew it wasn't stationary in sky observed thru binocs and it winked out chase planes saw headed to area

content.detailedDescription:
In 2013 on a beautiful day in late september i took a short video with my iphone of a red hawk in n. andover, ma. the hawk was dropping leaves and debris from about a 1000 feet. what i didn't realize was that i caught something else that i didn't see until i watched the video on my computer screen. you'll see a commercial plane coming out of the top cloud at 26 seconds. it's heading from n. to s. coming out of a cirrus cloud approx. 7 to 20 thousand feet strait up looking out my vehicles moonroof. it takes about 12 seconds for the plane to go from the top cloud to bottom cloud. planes speed approx. 500/700 mph. then out of the right side of the video comes what looks like a daytime satellite (which i've never seen or filmed before) going e. to w. i've seen scores of night satellites none have been or seemed as bright as this day time ufo. this ufo also looks closer to the earth then the plane did and was traveling at 3x the speed of the plane. it only takes seconds for it to go the distance the plane did? it also looks like it's arching downward a bit in the video. i didn't notice the second object/ufo until i downloaded the video to my computer other wise i would have taken longer footage of it. you may notice flickering of the leaves that the red hawk was dropping if you watch it a few times. after seeing the video i showed it to friends & family because i though it was unique and i'm not quite sure what i videoed here. what do you think? 
i hope you all enjoy!
content.summary: Filming a plane, didn't realize i caught something else?

content.detailedDescription: Picture taken facing north while visiting south mountain park, numerous other pics were taken without objects in view.
content.summary: Noticed object while uploading pictures taken.

content.detailedDescription:
1. my spouse and is were in our den watching tv.
2. the drape was wide open and the we were
under winter storm advisory. we noticed this 
"star" type ufo shining very brightly over the 
lake near jefferson and 13 mile road
3. we took a picture of it to get a better look.
4. i took the photo and widen it and noticed it
appeared like a boomerang shape
5. i showed my spouse and he kept looking at it
6. he said he notices this thing only on 
extremely cold days
7. we took out the iphone went to the safari
setting and looked up ufo in michigan
8.  read that there was a siting in december 
1996 in the same area after a christmas
tree lighting ceremony at that time.
9. we finally had to go to bed it was late.
10. i am not scared of it but we both
feel that perhaps it resides under the
the lake .
11. it us now 10:23 and it appears as it may 
have moved closer to west of where it was
12.  it firs seem to be splitting or moving
somehow while still staying together.
content.summary: Husband & i  usually see this "star" type object when very cołd out over the lake

content.detailedDescription: I went to the window to look at the sky around 9:00 pm as i often do to look at the stars and  or moon.I saw a real bright star and decided to take a picture of it.It went from 1 bright light to 3 bright lights and almost looked like a ring.It did seem to move a little bit.I was surprised at first and then happy that i was able to get a few pictures.My camera is a digital and they aren't the best pictures but for me enough.The lights stayed there and after 20-30 minutes i went and sat on my bed to watch tv.At 11:30 pm i went back to the window and it was gone!!I took another picture where there was nothing.Was it a satellite? government experiment or extraterrestrial vehicle?I don't know but it was interesting to me.Did anybody else see this on the same night??
content.summary: I took pictures of star and saw it move and went from 1 bright light to 3 lights.

content.detailedDescription: There was a group of us together for my birthday. it was a friday night. some of the friends went to buy beer for the night. we had just all arrived at my house and all of us were standing outside talking, just hanging out. we noticed my friends truck had stopped down the street, we could see their headlights, and we could here them screaming to us. they were yelling loudly and pointing toward some orange light that seemed to be floating just above the house to the side of them. they were literally out of the truck in a sec after stopping the vehicle so they could yell to us down the street. they (about 4 guys) got back in the little pick up truck and drove to my house. the light appeared to follow them, to our location, and many of us got scared. i was in such pure shock that i didn't know what to say, so i started flicking my lighter above my head. that made everyone even more nervous, i could tell everyone just wanted this thing to go away. it was shaped like a cigar, and had again stopped just above house right in front of us about 30 feet away, it's glow was bright enough to give off some light to the top of the house. it felt like we were being directly observed, i mean that light was dead stopped, and then followed my friends above the tree line to our location, and then stopped again. it was huge at least 17-18 feet wide, it was at least half the size of the length of the roof that it was directly above. i worried for the people in the house below it. i remember looking at one friend standing next to me, i was thinking, she looks frozen in position, i thought is she in shock? she would not or could not even respond to my question of "what the hell is that?" after she didn't respond, i asked her again, still no response, she didn't move or blink, she just stared at it like we all did, but then i touched her, and it was like she unfroze instantly, like i turned her back on or something,  it made me jump back, she immediately said "i'm going in the house" like nothing was happening!  she touched the only other girl there, and they both went inside. neither of the girls seemed scared at all, they were more calm like they knew that thing or something, they seemed unaffected at all and when we brought it up to them that night, they said they went inside and didn't want to watch it. i know they seen it! their calm demeanor scared me, i'm telling you, something about their calmness seemed chilling. when a bunch of men are scared by something we believe to be a ufo and the woman aren't afraid at all, just calm, i just don't know how to understand that. back to the orange cigar, it stayed with us for 5 minutes, directly above the house in front of us, about ten feet to fifteen feet above the house. at this point it had travelled less then a quarter of a mile from west to east along the tree line when it stopped above the house in front of us for five minutes. it seems to be turning, spinning, but it always remained as a cigar shape. it color would get slightly darker and slightly brighter but always remained a sun glowing orange. i tried to convince myself it was anything but ufo, but as it started to ascend north west, it did so very slowly,for at least 10-15 minutes. it was such an amount of time, that i could now just barely see the light. then in a split second, it took off in a raging speed, it left and amazing bright trail and took off in a direction that was more east then north east. it shot off fast as or faster then a shooting star. when it did this, at the end of the trail, it appeared to disintegrated as well but i imagine it was hitting a speed that i couldn't see it anymore, or maybe it hitting an even faster speed. either way it was gone and the trail disappeared as fast as the, light did. i'm still friends with many of the people who were there. none of us have ever spoken to each other about it since that night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: March 7th 1997 large group of 18-21 year old witness orange cigar ufo in port st lucie florida

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed about to fall asleep, i was watching the rain out my window when i saw a bright greenish blue light that light up the entire sky in a flash. and then it did it again about 2 minutes later and again another few minutes later. it wasn't a clear night so i could only see it through the clouds, but it wasn't heat lightning as it's winter and it wasn't regular lightning as it was a florescent greenish blue color. thought maybe it was a meteor, but haven't seen anything in the news about one.
content.summary: Large pulse of bright greenish blue light light up entire sky and then did it again a few minutes later 2 more times.

content.detailedDescription: My family (2 adults, 2 small children) were driving in the catalina foothills north of tucson, arizona, and i (the passenger) observed what i thought was a small campfire on the mountainside. we drove up the road to get a better look and so that i could report it to the sheriff's office, but as we approached it became clear that the fire was actually a large orb of red and orange light. when we were as close as we could be at the top of the road, the object lifted off the mountainside and flew very quickly over our car, but it was nowhere to be seen when i stepped out to see where it went. spooked, we went back down a side street to turn around and leave. as we got back to the main road though, the red and orange orb was back hovering over the mountainside again where it "blinked" off and back on occasionally. it appeared fairly close but made no sound at all. this went on for about ten minutes before we drove away not wanting to scare the kids who were already a little shaken by it.
content.summary: Red and orange orb over the foothills in tucson, arizona

content.detailedDescription: I was just going to the kitchen, when i looked out of the window and saw some kind of light. at first i thought that it might be a space station, but after i looked more closely i saw it move back and forth, up and down. i took my camera, set it on tripod. the shutter speed was at 10 sec, f stop at 5.6 and iso at 100, zoom was at 55mm. took some shots and in one particular i saw the object actually move straight, a little bit up and down. i know that i didnt touch the camera while i was shooting, and it was taken inside the house, so there was no wind, that could make this distortion. unfortunatly there there isnt any comparison with nature, because the object was pretty far away, so i had to zoom in close to actually take the foto.
content.summary: Pulsating light hovering in a far distance.

content.detailedDescription:
Was out looking at stars standing in my driveway. sky was clear. while viewing the sky to the east these two red spheres appeared right before me and another witness, looking as if they were dropped, coming from something. they were extremely close, maybe 500 feet away and 250 to 400 feet high. the first sphere started pulsating and took a flight path almost directly over us moving very slowly heading west. myself and another witness that was with me watched this for 3 minutes or so until it just shot straight up and was gone. 

we were just talking and astonished at how low and slow it went by us when we both looked back to the east and saw a second sphere in the same location also red and pulsating and taking the same flight path over us when it stopped and hovered for maybe 20 t0 30 seconds an resumed the same path and then just went straight up and it was gone. we watched this second sphere for 3 to 4 minutes.

we both just looked at each other knowing those were not man made crafts and feeling like the second sphere when it hovered was observing us or observing something.

i have lived in sebastian for many years and enjoy viewing the night sky and stars and have seen 3 astonishing ufo related events in this area prior to these two spheres.

this is the first time i have ever posted any information on any site, but it is real........
content.summary: Looking at sky when 2 red  spheres/orbs appeared from no where.

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday night - approx 6:15. kids were playing with other neighborhood kids. i was out side taking christmas decorations down. i looked up to the south and noticed a very bright slow moving light. i thought it could have been the iss because of height and initial brightness of the object. i watched it move se to nw for about 30 seconds, and then it stopped and hovered. at this time the light changed from a bright white to a bright blue, then yellow, then red. my thought at this time is that it was a police helicopter, i called my wife out to view, and grabbed my canon t1. i could not get a clear shot of the object because of the height (normally i can photograph helicopters with no issue)
i did capture a 1:50 video of the object as it moved from hover to a southern location, then north, then as it moved west over the hills - video shows color change as well. no flashing lights like a plane or copter, or any aircraft that i have seen before.

my wife has a 10 sec phone video, as does my son. 

there was no sound whatsoever. the altitude that i approximate this object is 10-15k feet (although it could be much higher) i assume this because of the size - at the distance i viewed to the naked eye it was about the size of a dime..

cant be sure what this object was.
content.summary: Bright color changing light -

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to watch my neighbors with fireworks and seen in a distance a red glow about the size of a ball. the red object was getting bigger and thought it was just fireworks but moving towards us. the size of it was so big above our tree line. object was very slow and then stopped over our neighborhood, it was the size of a house or bigger. the object was just hovering for about a min and then it went straight up and so fast. the object was different reds with a glow and white below the red. no sound and moved so fast going up. i was not drinking and other people had seen it as well. i was yelling at my wife to come see this and was very excited that i had seen something and how big and fast it was. when i first seen the object, i was curious and waiting to see if it was some fireworks. then became anxious and nervous as it hovered over us. then i denied what i just seen. what is weird i do not remember anything else, time or when i went to bed. i feel like it scared me and same with wife but she did not want to go back outside and was scared also. then we just joked about it. oh and i do not drink and i am an engineer and look for facts not little green men!
content.summary: I thought object was meteor with red glow as it came towards us but this one stopped and hovered and it scared me after it left.

content.detailedDescription:
Going home from work from overland park to gladstone i almost always take the same route of 435 (east/north direction)i am in a habit of paying attention to my driving and surroundings. i was headed home apprx. 7:30-8:30 pm i looked over to my right side of windshield to see in the sky above tree level (there was a tall hill just below the object)not sure how high above tree level. what caught my eye was the large green and red stationary lights like possibly on the corners of a craft, the object and lights were stationary. i have driven this same route for almost a year and have never seen lights at that level on either sides of the road. after seeing this i made sure the next day while driving to work in the day light to see if a tower or anything tall could be the source. driving home in the evening i did the same thing. there is nothing on either side of the highway that would have created this craft or siting. still i look for anything that could explain what i saw and there is nothing. it was not red/green stop lights because they would not have been at that heighth. this siting was above a tall hill along the hwy. i waited till i could find someone else in missouri who may have seen something similar and i found this article from about same time frame (i couldnt remember the exact day i saw this just knowing it was before thanksgiving:

november 13, 2013ufo sightings: remarkable eyewitness reports #07 - nov 14, 2013 case 1: large triangle or boomerang spotted over new jersey and missouri november 9, 2013 11.40 pm ���. o���fallon missouri
i was out walking with my girlfriend and her dog tonight in o���fallon missouri. the sky was cloudless, with nice star viewing. i was looking up at the stars while she was watching the dog doing what dogs do when i noticed an object moving through the night sky at approx 11:40pm (plus or minus 15 minutes), saturday november 9th.
.....I first noticed it because it was blocking out the stars as it moved. the object was completely unlit, and was quite dark ��� although not as dark as the blackness of the sky itself. i could clearly make out its boomerang v shape as it passed above me, since it was slightly lighter than the background. it was not easy to see, extremely subtle, and would be easily missed. it was silent. it moved at the same speed and in the same unwavering direction the entire time i watched it. i was able to track it for less than one minute. it moved from roughly north to south across the sky, and was nearly directly overhead as it passed me. its course would have been roughly parallel to highway k in o���fallon, mo, the nearest large road to my viewing location.
i did not get a chance to view its entire course across the sky, i first noticed it perhaps halfway up from the horizon as it approached me and then lost it in a similar position as it passed into the distance...It was impossible for me to tell how big it was or how high due to a lack of scale reference to it.
 the object was a squared off ���v��� shaped aerial machine. the angle of the ���v��� was wide, perhaps as much as 120 degrees. it was a narrow, if you want an approx of its appearance/shape/scale then imagine two black 12 inch rulers pinned together at a wide angle.
after looking at it a few seconds, and continued to verbally express my incomprehension of what this object was...The closest aerial vehicle that i know in comparison to what i saw would be the northrop b2 bomber, which are stationed in central missouri, and i have seen them in flight before. however, given the actual size of a b2 vs the relative size of the object i saw, the engine noise would have been extreme. 
other than the green/red lights this sounded very similar...
content.summary: Large black object with stationary red/green lights

content.detailedDescription: I was walking toward my apartment, noticing how clear the sky was and how the air suddenly seemed a bit warmer, when my attention caught  what seemed to be a star twinkling differently than the rest. i stopped to see if it might actually be a plane but it didn't move as a plane would. it's light seemed to change between red, orange, and sometimes green. it would brighten and dim erratically and i noticed that it was slightly moving toward the north though the altitude remained the same. as i watched this hovering light, i saw a flash of descending white light just south of it. still, the red-orange light barely moved. after about 10 minutes of observing the hovering light, i went into my apartment to get my telescope. when i got outside and began to adjust the telescope, the hovering light dimmed and completely disappeared. keeping my eye on where it had been, i began to take the telescope back inside and the hovering light reappeared.  after bringing the telescope back in, i went back outside and the light had moved northwest and flickered again before disappearing. i took one last look as i went back into my apartment and the light was flickering again and had noticeably descended. the entire experience felt like a game of peek-a-boo. it left me feeling excited, nervous, and shaky.
content.summary: Hovering red-orange light and flash of white light that quickly descended.

content.detailedDescription: My best friend called me out to see the bright objects in the sky. she handed me the binoculars, i looked at roughly 12 objects. one was dull orange oblong shaped, 6 were triangular-arrow shaped from what i can explain and the colors were blinking blue,red,white,purple. i also seen a white sphere shaped that had a white beam coming out of it. seen a couple that had various colors blinking that was oval shaped and tilted. a few minutes after i seen one flying that had 3 sets of white/yellowish lights that were very bright (maybe the wings) flying very very fast, i followed it until it went behind trees and lost sight of it. went inside to google about maybe possible drones and the little dipper seeing they were part of it and check on their diamond shape seeing they were the shape of one. had internet problems, the pages i opened in another tab weren't loading. went back out about 25 minutes later to look at them with my binoculars, thinking maybe one of them was jupiter. and observed another lit up circular shaped flying object that was smaller and flying way faster than the first one did. told our next door neighbors about it who also came out and seen it as well.
content.summary: Educational and intriging

content.detailedDescription: I was driving eastbound on the overpass of i5 at exit 14 ridgefield, wa exit. after driving from the off ramp onto the overpass which goes over i5 i headed eastbound into ridgefield, wa, i looked to my right out my passenger window where i could see i5 lead to the base of a small mountain range which appears to be woodland hills perhaps. at the height of the hills/mountains that lie directly above i5 or at least from my view there is an indented area that's kind of like the cleavage of the hills, i saw a very large lighted flickering blob like mass atop the hills. it was not hovering but looked as if it was attached. this white mass had to have been 10-15 mi across. there were no clouds in the sky and it was broad daylight. the object was so bright and the contrast so great from its surrounding area that it should have been night but it was in the middle of the afternoon. there is nothing that i know of in that area either, it was too large to be a satellite on the ground and there is no lake in that area, plus as i moved its light stayed solid and incredibly bright yet did not give off light rays. it was the shape of a lake or something but bright white flickering light. i have no idea what it was.
content.summary: Large flickering white mass atop hills around woodland, wa

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work and noticed an orange light at the top of the mountain range that i assumed was the beginning of a wild fire.  as i kept driving north, i noticed the light was coming towards me.  it came around where i was at and hovered over an apartment complex to the west of me.  i thought it was a hot air balloon, the way it floated and how bright the light was, but then i realized it was not a balloon.  it was fire orange on the bottom and the top was in a triangular shape and the color yellow.  as i continued to follow it, it started moving away from me, almost as though it noticed i noticed it.  it headed back towards the northwest mountain range it came from.  it was not large in size, probably 1/4 of the size of a hot air balloon.  if you have any explanations or any other sightings you could share with me, it would greatly ease my mind!!!
content.summary: Orange 'fire-like' lights came from mountains into middle of city, hovered and headed back towards mountains.

content.detailedDescription: See above
content.summary: Bright white light  and flashing  and other one solid orange

content.detailedDescription:
A companion and i were walking east on burlwood street in cedar hills, from the 45 central building development site, right about at the intersection of 139th and burlwood when we saw a light in the sky--it just showed up all of a sudden���i took it to be a helicopter with the front windshield lit up by the sun, but it wasn���t facing the sun (sun was low and to the south) it was heading northwest we think, but it was hard to tell because of the way it hovered.  a car was pulling out of its driveway, so we stopped and i looked at the car for a second, remarking to my friend that i hadn���t noticed the car as i was looking up at the helicopter. my friend said he was looking at the helicopter too. when we both looked back up at the sky, mere seconds later���it was gone. completely gone. we looked and looked in the sky, thinking it might have been behind some trees, it couldn���t have flown away that fast, and it had been too large just not to see it, even if the sun was at the wrong angle etc (we saw a far off jet plane to the east [flying south] quite easily). we never saw it. talking about this, we realized that we never heard the sounds of a helicopter and had called it that just because we assumed it was a helicopter at first. it was, actually, silent and we never did see more of it than the bright reflective ���front���. we have no idea what it could have been, but it was not a helicopter or a plane. 
we were pretty perplexed, and decided to see if we could find anything like it on google images--but didn't find anything that matched what we saw.
content.summary: Silent bright helicopter-sized thing that hovered in sky in front of us then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was up on the roof of our rental condo with my telescope looking at jupiter around 9pm with my brother. it was then when he pointed out a group of 5 or 6 objects that seemed to give off red/orange/green lights. the objects would change direction quickly and ascended very slowly. the lights would pulsate for a bit and then fizzled out completely. when we first saw them, i called down for my father because he is a pilot. i figured that he would have an explanation, but he could not come up with one. we attempted to video the lights, but by the time my dad got his camcorder, the lights were almost gone. my mother also witnessed the lights, and could not explain the lights either. she is the biggest skeptic that i know.
content.summary: Lights over fort myers

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in the passenger seat of my car, heading north on i-5 just before exit 206 in washington. i was looking out the window and noticed two groups of silver objects moving in a straight southwestern line to the east side of the freeway. this was a bright clear day and the objects were highly reflective. i assumed they were aircraft but couldn't make out any clear shape or structure. they were oblong and seemed to be two-toned with division between top and bottom. there was a group of 5 five in an lop-sided v and a group of 4 clustered together in an irregular shape. they seemed to be fixed in relation to each other as though they were connected or in formation. they were moving at about the speed (and possibly altitude?) of a helicopter. they were closest to the freeway when i first noticed them. my view was blocked briefly by a bus. i caught sight of them again, and tried to take a picture but my cell phone froze. i looked down at my phone a second time to see if it had started working, and when i looked back they had disappeared. i would have expected to still be able to see them based on their speed and direction. possibly they were only visible because of the reflected sunlight and i lost the angle.
content.summary: Saw two clusters of oblong silver objects flying in one direction

content.detailedDescription: I live in paso robles, california. i am retired. i and 6 other friends are partners on a mining claim in the la panza mountain country which is about 30 miles south/east of here. one of my partners, mike, and i scheduled to meet up for a day of exploring, metal detecting. he lives in grover beach, on the coast and drives hwy 58 to redhill road. i drive from paso to hwy 58 but instead of turning onto redhill road, i go past that cause i'm driving a car and redhill road is a narlie dirt road that is not maintained very well, so i drive a extra 15 miles past redhill on hwy 58 to pozo road/la panza. this is all rural old cattle ranches that dot the perimeter of the los padres forest, la panza being a historic ranch, once a small town. a very popular place for dirt bike riders and weekend or hobbyist gold mining. i had just turned off of hwy 58 onto pozo road and had driven maybe 1/2 of a mile. i started to take some pictures cause of these pine trees that sit on the ridge of the mountains that can be seen for miles away to the west, where i was going. i'm writing another book about this area and the old indian/spanish/mexican trails and these pine trees seem to be a major monument along the old trail. i took about 5 pic's of them, all within 20 seconds, i was just short on the road to coming on up to the cdf (fire station). i never saw this object while i was taking pictures, it was just later as i started to review my pic's that i found it and it's just one picture. it it was a plane or helicopter, i would have waited for it to pass, but i never saw anything. if it was a bird, it would of been in my other pictures. it's true that there is a condor sanctuary back up in these mountains (beartrap canyon), but they are so rare to see, and if it was one of them, the bird would have been in the other pictures. it's the 3rd picture in... [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: East pozo road, la panza

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home with my grandmother, and we were outside on the back porch. that was something we regularly did from early to mid 2012, as we liked the view out there and it was warm and the house protected us from any wind movement.
my grandmother had gone outside to smoke when we noticed it. we thought the objects were stars at first, they looked like them but then we noticed they were too low and far too bright to be stars. we rationalized that they must be airplanes, but my grandmother knows from years of experience that planes don't fly that low and it was too late for helicopters to be out on the property.
there were 3 of the objects, floating in a triangle formation near the tops of the trees a couple hundred feet away it seemed like. they stayed that way for nearly ten minutes. they were spherical in shape and had an orangeish golden glow, almost like the color the sun if it were extremely dim. they didn't light up anything except for themselves.
the top object went up after the initial ten minutes, then incredibly slowly started moving up and forward towards our house. after about five minutes, the other two started to follow it in the same pattern. we watched for five more minutes but they had started to move more quickly, and after about 20 minutes in total all three of them were gone. we never specifically saw those spheres again.
i wasn't particularly scared, more curious than anything else. i didn't feel much fear. i know i didn't want them to come anywhere near my home though, that thought filled me with dread. my grandmother and i didn't do much as we watched them, just kind of stood there and discussed what we thought they were doing. we didn't call them ufos, we called them lights as that's what they reminded us of.
we lost sight of the three objects after they disappeared over our roof to where we couldn't see them anymore. i alone went to the other porch to see if i could see them; i waited for about two minutes but i never spotted them.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lights hover over property.
